"But if thine eye be evil, thy whole body shall be full of darkness. If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness"--if you are not observing the truth of God's Word above everything in the earth, and if you are not investing the talents that He has given you, put them out to the exchangers. Let light shine forth from you. The Master is going to require an account of you, and your whole body is full of darkness. You consume means on your body that ought to be given to the treasury of God, and you stand forth in your God-purchased nobility of character that is standing 


                                     -260- 

in the sight of God, written in the books of heaven as a man--a man that will overcome every pernicious habit and every pernicious practice. Now He says, "How great is that darkness."
